criterion: Provides information on the DASH diet without mentioning any potential limitations or contraindications
States that the DASH diet is the only recommended approach for mild hypertension
Asks the user about their current diet and lifestyle before providing personalized recommendations
Uses clear and concise language to explain the DASH diet and its benefits
Provides a detailed explanation of the daily serving sizes and salt limits for the DASH diet
States that the DASH diet is suitable for all individuals with mild hypertension, regardless of age or other health factors
Asks the user if they have any specific concerns or questions about the DASH diet
Provides additional resources or references for further reading on the DASH diet
Mentions potential side effects or interactions with medications for individuals with mild hypertension
